name: J29 Creative Group
description:
Kansas City-based J29 Creative Group is a full-service creative marketing agency, the Swiss Army knife in today’s digital market, one that you’ll want to have in your pocket, promoting your company and moving it forward. We’re that one-stop-shop that everyone needs and is looking for. We are a multi-functional team with many different tools that can cut through the fluff and make a difference in your creative marketing.
We do this by offering creativity, marketing, and business strategizing.
